doc:
Virginia Capers https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Virginia_Capers 0 Eliza Capers (September 22, 1925 – May 6, 2004) was an American actress. She won the Tony Award for Best Lead Actress in a Musical in 1974 for her performance as Lena Younger in Raisin, a musical version of Lorraine Hansberry's play A Raisin in the Sun. Eliza_Capers ( September_22_,_1925 – May_6_,_2004 ) was an_American_actress . She won the_Tony_Award for Best_Lead_Actress in a_Musical in 1974 for her_performance as Lena_Younger in Raisin , a_musical_version of Lorraine_Hansberry 's_play_A_Raisin in the_Sun .
